author: Staff Reporter
text:
On January 30, winners of the Tamil Nadu inter-school creative writing competition will be announced. The awards, titled the Young Writers’ Literary Award, 2015, will be presented at Century Foundation Matriculation Higher Secondary School, Tirupur.

The competition was announced in June 2015 for all English Medium Schools in the State as a nation-wide talent search effort by Butterfly Sneeze Media, Bangalore. Prizes will be presented in seven separate categories, i.e., from classes Six to Twelve. An ‘overall winner’ award will be given for the best among all the 6,450 participants from over 500 schools.

The top 200 short stories were announced on December 21st, 2015.

The top 50 were announced on January 20th.
title: Literary award for young writers
